menu.title: Fitness Menu
menu.descr: Fitness Menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. Product for active and healthy people. A completely new product with optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: Premium Menu
menu.descr: In the Premium Menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design but also high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits â€” restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!

menu.title: Fasting Menu
menu.descr: Fasting Menu features careful selection of ingredients: completely free of animal products, milk from almonds, oats, coconut, or buckwheat, proper protein content thanks to tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.
